Screenwriter: Joris Avodo, François Mark, Noémie Schmidt, Elisabeth Vogler
Synopsis: On one beautiful afternoon in Paris during the surreal summer of 2020, 24 different characters roam the streets of the city with a sense of giddy abandon after a spring of lockdown and confinement. Everyday people cross paths throughout the day, experiencing their long-awaited freedom and celebrating the city.
Title: Roaring 20's
